function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and room design in communal facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks in schools, community centers, and healthcare facilities.","Mitigation":"Reassess and update design standards to prioritize better ventilation and flexible room design for social distancing. Implement compartmentalized ventilation systems.","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, smart ventilation controls, and flexible room design solutions.","People":"Communities using communal facilities, staff working in communal facilities, and visitors to communal facilities.","Owner":"Architects, building developers, and facility managers."},{"Description":"High density of shoppers in supermarkets during a pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks due to crowded shopping spaces.","Mitigation":"Formal inclusion of half aisles or readily removable shelving to create half aisles. Increase aisle spacing at the expense of open design areas. Consider reducing the density of shoppers.","Technologies":"Flexible shelving and display systems, advanced crowd management technology, and automated traffic flow systems.","People":"Shoppers, supermarket staff, and delivery personnel.","Owner":"Supermarket owners and retail business managers."},{"Description":"Lack of resilience in newly built dwellings against pandemics","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and poor living conditions in future housing developments.","Mitigation":"Empower future homeowners and developers to prioritize resilient design and construction against the effects of pandemics. Implement guidelines for resilient building design and materials.","Technologies":"Resilient construction materials, smart home technology, and advanced sanitation systems.","People":"Future homeowners, building developers, and construction professionals.","Owner":"Building developers and construction firms."}]}
